mapper.select: SELECT ll.no, ll.user_no AS uno, ll.lesson_date AS date, ll.lesson_contents AS contents, u.name AS studentName FROM lesson_log ll JOIN users u ON ll.user_no = u.no ORDER BY ll.lesson_date DESC
SELECT ll.no, ll.user_no AS uno, ll.lesson_date AS date, ll.lesson_contents AS contents, u.name AS studentName FROM lesson_log ll JOIN users u ON ll.user_no = u.no WHERE ll.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lesson_log (user_no, lesson_date, lesson_contents) VALUES (#{uno}, #{date}, #{contents})
